name: Liminal Space
description:
Survival Horror?

Choose your map and try to escape. It's up to you if you want monsters chasing you or if you want a peaceful experience with no threats.

Customize Your Gameplay

Try playing with VHS graphics or retro style 90's graphics (I know this trope is becoming overdone but it looks cool).

Atmosphere Is Everything

Immerse yourself with a haunting soundtrack of over 15 unsettling dreamcore/weirdcore songs.




A Note From The Developer

Hi! Thanks so much for checking out my game. I think its important to be transparent with the community, so just know that I am plan on adding more content over time with free updates and no microtransactions. This game is currently just a fun little atmospheric walking simulator where you need to find multiple items to escape, hence the cheap price. There is no progression or saving. I am open to adding stuff like this is in the future if the fanbase becomes large enough. Thank you for reading!
